nodes.text: Gelleric was a Jedi Master of the Jedi Order during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. When Quinlan Vos made his notes in the Book of Sith, he reflected that since Gelleric was the only Jedi whom he could think of who wielded a double-bladed lightsaber, it was possible that it was indeed a Sith weapon.
Gelleric's name is a tuckerization of Eric Geller, friend of author Daniel Wallace and a former staff member at Star Wars news site TheForce.net.
